title: 12/29/20 – HOUR 2 – A Chief Concern. Plus, Albert Breer!
itunes:title: 12/29/20 – HOUR 2 – A Chief Concern. Plus, Albert Breer!
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre fill in for Dan Patrick and explain why the Kansas City Chiefs will not have a cakewalk to Super Bowl LV like many have previously predicted. Plus, they speak with MMQB’s Albert Breer about the top coaching jobs available and how the Patriots plan to address their quarterback vacancy this offseason. The guys also debate the best point guard in the NBA right now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
